pages.text: $(li)The Ancient Tome Piercing can be used to upgrade an enchanted item with Piercing IV enchantment to level V.$(br)$(li)To apply this enchant, you need to place the desired item and the ancient tome in an $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/anvil)Anvil$(/l) while you have at least 30 levels of experience.
pages.title: A.T. Piercing V

pages.text: $(li)The Ancient tomes can only be obtained rarely in $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l).
